description:
Pants that stand up to summer hikes and treks. A nylon blend provides stretch for high-stepping on rugged trails, and is quick to dry after an unexpected stream dip or after a camp laundry load. Plenty of pockets keep trail essentials close at hand.Lightweight nylon fabric has plenty of stretch.Full zip fly and snap closure.Gusseted crotch and articulated knees for comfort and mobility.

        Sustainability








Bluesign











                      Bluesign® Approved Material
name: Arc'teryx Lefroy Pants - Men's
